A '''potion of Healing''' is a potion that provides [[Instant Health]] when used.

The potion heals all entities and damages undead mobs.

== Obtaining ==
=== Brewing ===
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Glistering Melon Slice

|Potion of Healing
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing
|Glowstone Dust
|base = Potion of Healing
|Potion of Healing Enhanced
|name = Potion of Healing II
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing

|base3= Potion of Healing Enhanced

|Splash Potion of Healing
|Splash Potion of Healing Enhanced
|name = Splash Potion of Healing
|ingredients = [[Gunpowder]] +<br> '''Potion of Healing'''
}}
{{Brewing
|Dragon's Breath
|base2=Splash Potion of Healing
|base3=Splash Potion of Healing Enhanced
|
|Lingering Potion of Healing

|ingredients = [[Dragon's Breath]] +<br> '''Splash Potion of Healing'''
|foot=1
}}

=== Mob loot ===
A [[witch]] has an 8.5% chance to drop a potion of Healing if it dies while drinking the potion.

=== Generated loot ===
{{IN|be}} the cauldron in a [[swamp hut]] has a 25% chance to contain a potion of [[Healing]].

Two Instant Health II potions can be found in the brewing stand on [[End ship]]s in End cities.
{{LootChestItem|lingering-potion-of-healing}}

==== Undead mobs ====
{{main|Potion#Undead mobs}}
The effect of potions of Healing are reversed on [[undead]] mobs. It deals damage instead of heals them.

=== Base potion ===
Potion of Healing is a base for brewing [[potions of Harming]].
{{Brewing
|head = 1
|Fermented Spider Eye
|base = Potion of Healing
|Potion of Harming
|showvariants=1
}}
{{Brewing

|base = Potion of Healing Enhanced
|Potion of Harming Enhanced
|name = [[Potion of Harming]] II
|ingredients = [[Fermented Spider Eye]] +<br> '''Potion of Healing II'''
|showvariants=1
|foot = 1
}}
